config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The 'skipUpscaling' configuration option is loaded from the preferences and set to a checkbox in the user interface. When the checkbox is selected, it indicates that the user wants to skip upscaling during the image processing.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'skipUpscaling' configuration depends on the user's choice in the user interface. If the user selects the checkbox to skip upscaling, the configuration will be triggered whenever the image processing is performed.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'skipUpscaling' configuration option on the system is that it can potentially save processing time and resources by skipping the upscaling process for images. However, this may result in lower quality output images if upscaling is necessary for certain images.
